scenario_text.value: Hm? Is that...
Miu! What are you doing here?

Takuma! You finally came! I’ve been so scared
by myself...
Sorry.
Takuma... I’m sorry, I can’t stand up...
Are you okay?

Don’t push yourself. We can rest if you need
to.

No, we can’t afford to stop now. We have to
find Aoi right away!
I don’t want anyone else to suffer!
Yeah...
Takuma?
(Something seems off about this.)

(But something about this just doesn’t seem
right. Why can’t I put my finger on it?)

(Was it when I started talking to her...? No,
the moment I saw her?)
(When did she get here in the first place?)
(And where’s Syakomon, anyway?!)
(What I want to know is...)
When did she get here?
Where did Syakomon go?
So, how long have you been here, exactly?

Because nobody was here after that weird
stuff that happened with Shuuji and Ryo.
Have you been here the whole time?
Miu?
Where did Syakomon go?

Syakomon...? Search me... How’m I supposed to
know?

How are you... You two are always together,
aren’t you?
Are you more worried about Syakomon than me?!
No, that’s not it...

Hey, hurry and gimme a piggyback, will you?
I can hardly stand up here.
Uh, sure... Here, climb on.

(That’s weird... I can feel the hairs on the
back of my neck stand up. This isn’t right!)
Takuma... Miu’s acting weird!
Wha... Whyyyy would youuu sayyy thaaat?!
You... You’re not Miu! Show yourself!
Graaaaaaaaawr!
Takuma, it’s the enemy!
